name: sqlite3_page_dissector
description: Visually explore the contents of each page in any SQLite3 database
author: arun@siara.cc

scripts.package-mas: electron-packager . --overwrite --platform=mas --arch=x64 "Sqlite Page Explorer" --osx-sign --osx-sign.identity="3rd Party Mac Developer Installer: Arundale Ramanathan (K4J7VPDHY4)" --app-bundle-id=cc.siara.sqlite_page_explorer --helper-bundle-id=cc.siara.sqlite_page_explorer.helper --app-version=1.0.0 --build-version=1.0.100 --electron-version=3.0.9 --icon=res/icons/db_search.icns --prune=true --out=release-builds
scripts.package-win32: electron-packager . sqlite3-page-explorer --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=res/icons/db_search.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName="Siara Logics (cc)" --version-string.FileDescription="Visually explore the contents of each page in any SQLite3 database" --version-string.ProductName="Sqlite Page Explorer"
